thread.title: Earthquake in India: Quake measuring 4.6 on Ritcher Scale hit Sikkim
thread.title_full: Earthquake in India: Quake measuring 4.6 on Ritcher Scale hit Sikkim

author: FE Online
title: Earthquake in India: Quake measuring 4.6 on Ritcher Scale hit Sikkim
text:
Earthquake in India: Quake measuring 4.6 on Ritcher Scale hit Sikkim Earthquake in India: Quake measuring 4.6 on Ritcher Scale hit Sikkim A minor tremor was felt in the nort-eastern state of Sikkim early in the morning today. As per the initial report, the quake was measured 4.6 on the Ritcher scale. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: March 27, 2017 5:06 AM The quake was measured 4.6 on the Ritcher scale. (Representation image: Reuters) 
A minor tremor was felt in the nort-eastern state of Sikkim early in the morning today. As per the initial report, the quake was measured 4.6 on the Ritcher scale. 
Further information awaited
